item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Snaxchain throughput is crazy now thanks to @conduitxyz G2 âš¡ï¸
250ms blocks at 200m/gas puts trades on @synthetix_io v4 at ~400 trades per second or ~34.56M trades/day.
100% onchain, fully composable, pasture raised, decentralized settlement.
Checkmate tradfi bros.
Milady
